title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 181.6 - General warrant issuance procedure
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 181.6 - General warrant issuance procedure

State Regulations

Local practices with respect to the issuance of a warrant may
vary, but the general procedure to be followed in order to issue a warrant is
to: (a) call the central services unit
within the region, or the office assigned warrant responsibility; (b) have the appropriate person fill out a

Division for Youth warrant form (a warrant number may be inserted, depending
upon local practice); and
(c) have
the appropriate person send or take the warrant to the local and/or State
police in accordance with local practice. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
181.6

For current local practices, see section 181.13 of this

Part, Local practices pertaining to the issuance and execution of
warrants. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
